data.comment: Goias kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Palmeiras's Luiz Adriano gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Marcelinho's header is off-target for Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Throw-in Goias.
In the minute 5, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
At Serra Dourada, Renan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 7, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Palmeiras.
Can Goias capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Arleu signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Goias's half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 17, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Marcelinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Bruno Arleu awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 22, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goias close to the penalty box.
Douglas Baggio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Bruno Arleu waits before resuming play because Luiz Adriano for Palmeiras is still down.
In the minute 25, Fabricio Santas silva (Palmeiras) has replaced the possibly injured Luiz Adriano at Serra Dourada.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
Douglas Baggio, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Shaylon is the substitute for Goias.
In the minute 29, In Goiania Palmeiras attack through Fabricio Santas silva. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In Goiania Goias drive forward through Keko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Goias.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Bruno Arleu signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Goias's half.
Throw-in Goias.
In the minute 34, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Mayke (Palmeiras) has been shown a straight red card by referee Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 40, Goias's Shaylon breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Marcelinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Bruno Arleu awards Goias a goal kick.
Keko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goias.
Goias are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
The away team have replaced Lucas Lima with Lucas Esteves. This is the second substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gustavo Gomez for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The away team replace Marcelinho with Gabriel Menino.
Bruno Arleu blows to start the second-half. Palmeiras with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Augusto Cesar (Goias) is making a second substitution, with Alyson replacing Gustavo Blanco.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
In the minute 48, Goias to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 50, Gabriel Menino (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Bruno Arleu.
The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Breno, who is down injured.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 56, Goias have a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 59, Goias’s Breno is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Goias attack but Fernandao's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 61, Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 69, Rafael Moura is replacing Taylon for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 71, Palmeiras's Ramires is on target but unsuccessful.
Alyson of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 77, Goias have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Goias's Jefferson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 77, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jefferson.
The home team has substituted Jefferson with Rodrigues. Augusto Cesar is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Goias.
Goias are pushing forward but Fernandao's finish is wide of the goal.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Augusto Cesar is making the team's fifth substitution at Serra Dourada with Miguel Figueira replacing Ariel Cabral.
In the minute 80, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Goias's area.
Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miguel Figueira (Goias) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 83, Goias are coming forward and Shaylon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bruno Arleu awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 84, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 87, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Abel Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Serra Dourada with Luan Garcia replacing Fabricio Santas silva.
Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Goias, close to Palmeiras's area.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Palmeiras.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Bruno Arleu will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Goias to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Palmeiras's Luan Garcia misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
That's full-time at Serra Dourada. The final score is 1-0.
Goias take a 1-0 lead thanks to Miguel Figueira.
